name: Iris's Bouquet
effects: Cure all status effects after battle

name: Iris's Bouquet
伊莉絲的花束
아이리스의 꽃다발
Bouquet d'Iris
Iris' Bouquet
Buqué de Iris
desc_short: Boost HP by 20% and cure poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone after battle
提高20%HP+結束戰鬥時治療異常狀態
HP 20% 상승+전투 종료 시 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 회복
Augmente les PV de 20% et soigne poi., céc., som., sil., para., conf., mala., et pétri. après le combat
Stellt LP um 20% wieder her und heilt Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille,Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein, nach dem Kampf.
Aumenta VIT un 20% y cura ven, ceg, sue, sil, par, con, enf y pie al terminar el combate
desc_long: Boosts HP by 20%, and cures poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone after battle.
提高20%HP，並結束戰鬥時治療異常狀態。
HP가 20% 상승하고, 전투 종료 시 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화를 회복합니다.
Augmente les PV de 20% et soigne poison, cécité, sommeil, silence, paralysie, confusion, maladie, et pétrification après le combat.
Stellt LP um 20% wieder her und heilt Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille,Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein, nach dem Kampf.
Aumenta la VIT un 20% y cura veneno, ceguera, sueño, silencio, parálisis, confusión, enfermedad y piedra al terminar el combate.
